headline: AES Announces Pricing of $800 Million of Senior Notes in Public Offering
summary: The AES Corporation (NYSE: AES) ("AES" or the "Company") announced today the pricing of $800 million aggregate principal amount of its 5.800% senior notes due 2032 (the "Notes"). The closing of the offering of the Notes is expected to occur, subject to certain customary closing conditions, on March 20, 2025 (T+6).

raw.headline: AES Announces Pricing of $800 Million of Senior Notes in Public Offering
raw.summary: The AES Corporation (NYSE: AES) ("AES" or the "Company") announced today the pricing of $800 million aggregate principal amount of its 5.800% senior notes due 2032 (the "Notes"). The closing of the offering of the Notes is expected to occur, subject to certain customary closing conditions, on March 20, 2025 (T+6).

headline: AES Announces Public Offering of Senior Notes
summary: The AES Corporation (NYSE: AES) ("AES" or the "Company") announced today its intention to offer, subject to market and other conditions, senior notes (the "Notes") in a registered public offering.

raw.headline: AES Announces Public Offering of Senior Notes
raw.summary: The AES Corporation (NYSE: AES) ("AES" or the "Company") announced today its intention to offer, subject to market and other conditions, senior notes (the "Notes") in a registered public offering.

headline: AES Announces Cash Tender Offer for Any and All of Its 3.300% Senior Notes due 2025
summary: The AES Corporation (NYSE: AES) ("AES" or the "Company") announced today the commencement of a tender offer to purchase (the "Tender Offer") for cash, subject to certain terms and conditions, any and all of its outstanding 3.300% Senior Notes due 2025 (the "Securities").

raw.headline: AES Announces Cash Tender Offer for Any and All of Its 3.300% Senior Notes due 2025
raw.summary: The AES Corporation (NYSE: AES) ("AES" or the "Company") announced today the commencement of a tender offer to purchase (the "Tender Offer") for cash, subject to certain terms and conditions, any and all of its outstanding 3.300% Senior Notes due 2025 (the "Securities").

headline: AES Corporation Is Too Cheap To Ignore
summary: AES Corporation is undervalued, expanding in renewables. AES offers a well-covered 6.3% dividend yield. Read our bullish thesis on AES stock here.
